ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons sour cream, or to taste
2 tablespoons blueberry preserves, or to taste

cookingTips: Use quality bread with slight sweetness to complement blueberry preserves
Warm preserves slightly before spreading for even distribution
Balance sour cream and preserves ratio to taste preference
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple sandwich echoes blintz flavors. How do you balance tartness and sweetness in quick preparations?
